article_title: '60 Minutes' Shows Insurers Deny Mental Health Treatment Despite ACA Rules

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Despite more comprehensive health insurance under the Affordable Care Act that includes mandatory coverage for mental health services, the noted TV newsmagazine 60 Minutes Sunday shined a light on the issue of patients denied treatment by doctors who never even saw them. CBS reporter Scott Pelley highlighted several cases where doctors working for insurance [...]
